review_title: Amazing place to work and develop
pros:
Personal growth and training is a huge focus
Very well paid
Amazing team culture
Well supported from day one
cons:
Not for everyone
High functioning environment where hard work is required

pros: I feel very fortunate to work in such a fun and nurturing environment.  Senior management ensure that I feel supported within my role and I have a clear voice within the company.  Great team diversity and a safe environment for all.
cons: I don't currently have any cons. For the first time in many years I don't dread going to work!
